title: Mobile Mayhem
description: Patty is a reluctant retiree in a Florida Mobile Home and RV Park. Socially awkward, she tries to reshape her new life with an ever-changing array of neighbors. Ever-changing, you say? Maybe if they would quit dying on her... Friends are hard for Patty; did she just point the newest murder investigation straight at her best friend? Patty HAS to solve it or lose her friend, and maybe her life!
author: Mary Lu Scholl
